00020 
00021 #ifndef _AUTOMATA_H_
00022 #define _AUTOMATA_H_
00023 
00024 #include "actypes.h"
00025 
00026 #ifdef __cplusplus
00027 extern "C" {
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 struct AC_NODE;
00031 
00032 typedef struct AC_AUTOMATA
00033 {
00034     /* The root of the Aho-Corasick trie */
00035     struct AC_NODE * root;
00036 
00037     /* maintain all nodes pointers. it will be used to access or release
00038     * all nodes. */
00039     struct AC_NODE ** all_nodes;
00040 
00041     unsigned int all_nodes_num; /* Number of all nodes in the automata */
00042     unsigned int all_nodes_max; /* Current max allocated memory for *all_nodes */
00043 
00044     /* this flag indicates that if automata is finalized by
00045      * ac_automata_finalize() or not. 1 means finalized and 0
00046      * means not finalized (is open). after finalizing automata you can not
00047      * add pattern to automata anymore. */
00048     unsigned short automata_open;
00049 
00050     /* It is possible to feed a large input to the automata chunk by chunk to
00051      * be searched using ac_automata_search(). in fact by default automata
00052      * thinks that all chunks are related unless you do ac_automata_reset().
00053      * followings are variables that keep track of searching state. */
00054     struct AC_NODE * current_node; /* Pointer to current node while searching */
00055     unsigned long base_position; /* Represents the position of current chunk
00056                                   * related to whole input text */
00057 
00058     /* The input text.
00059      * used only when it is working in settext/findnext mode */
00060     AC_TEXT_t * text;
00061     
00062     /* The lase searched position in the chunk. 
00063      * used only when it is working in settext/findnext mode */
00064     unsigned long position;
00065     
00066     /* Statistic Variables */
00067     
00068     /* Total patterns in the automata */
00069     unsigned long total_patterns;
00070     
00071 } AC_AUTOMATA_t;
00072 
00073 
00074 AC_AUTOMATA_t * ac_automata_init     (void);
00075 AC_STATUS_t     ac_automata_add      (AC_AUTOMATA_t * thiz, AC_PATTERN_t * str);
00076 void            ac_automata_finalize (AC_AUTOMATA_t * thiz);
00077 int             ac_automata_search   (AC_AUTOMATA_t * thiz, AC_TEXT_t * text, int keep, AC_MATCH_CALBACK_f callback, void * param);
00078 
00079 void            ac_automata_settext  (AC_AUTOMATA_t * thiz, AC_TEXT_t * text, int keep);
00080 AC_MATCH_t *    ac_automata_findnext (AC_AUTOMATA_t * thiz);
00081 
00082 void            ac_automata_release  (AC_AUTOMATA_t * thiz);
00083 void            ac_automata_display  (AC_AUTOMATA_t * thiz, char repcast);
00084 
00085 
00086 #ifdef __cplusplus
00087 }
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 #endif
